topic.title: Configure LDAP Authentication
topic.shortdesc: Only Full Administrators can configure LDAP authentication.

body.p: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) is a public standard that facilitates distributed directories (such as network user privilege information) over the network.
The LDAP Authentication setup allows you to configure cluster-wide authentication settings for LDAP.
body.note: Remote authentication with LDAP is available in the Enterprise Edition of the Couchbase Server.
body.p: To configure LDAP authentication with your Couchbase cluster, see LDAP authentication.
